name: Truth — Transparency Protocol
description: First of the Ten Scepters, governing transparency across all EV0L ledgers. Every transaction, yield, and mint event must be verifiable on-chain. The Solar Witness illuminates all hidden corners.

properties.evolvers_act_i_role: Solar Witness — illuminates all hidden corners

name: Justice — Fair Distribution Law
description: Second Scepter, ensuring equitable distribution across Civilian, Military, and Cosmic streams. Ayana Blue aligns the relics on the Codex Altar, maintaining balance.

properties.governance_function: Fair Distribution Law — Equity across all streams

name: Wisdom — Rarity Design Protocol
description: Third Scepter, preserving uniqueness. Each Codex NFT is a 1/1 artifact with no generative copies. The Four rise by elemental seals—fire, water, air, earth—each unique.

properties.evolvers_act_i_role: Archivist of the Singular — preserves uniqueness

name: Compassion — Heritage Protection Law
description: Fourth Scepter, shielding cultural and lineage-based assets from extraction. Memory and breath are invoked—honoring ancestors who walked before.

properties.governance_function: Heritage Protection Law — Cultural assets shielded

name: Discipline — Capped Supply Doctrine
description: Fifth Scepter, enforcing scarcity. Total supply capped at initial mint plus ceremonial expansions. Kongo Sonix holds the rhythm—discipline in the beat, discipline in the supply.

properties.governance_function: Capped Supply Doctrine — No arbitrary inflation

name: Faith — Cultural Anchoring Covenant
description: Sixth Scepter, binding economic value to cultural meaning. The Flame Crown acknowledges presence—faith is the bridge between matter and meaning.

properties.governance_function: Cultural Anchoring Covenant — Value bound to story

name: Service — Community Governance Treaty
description: Seventh Scepter, calling holders to stewardship. The Quadrant Council convenes—each voice heard, each service rendered. Governance, not extraction.

properties.governance_function: Community Governance Treaty — Active participation required
properties.evolvers_act_i_role: Council Convener — calls all to service

name: Strength — Economic Resilience Engine
description: Eighth Scepter, building exponential resilience. Treasury yields follow the π₄ law—unbreakable, adaptable, sovereign. No single shock can collapse the system.

properties.governance_function: Economic Resilience Engine — π₄ compounding law
properties.evolvers_act_i_role: Resilience Architect — systems that bend, never break

name: Humility — Ledger-Law Proof
description: Ninth Scepter, requiring submission to the ledger. Every proof-of-authority gesture is recorded, witnessed, auditable. No claim without verification.

properties.governance_function: Ledger-Law Proof — All claims must be verifiable
properties.evolvers_act_i_role: Ledger Scribe — writes what is, not what is claimed

name: Legacy — Cultural Permanence Scroll
description: Tenth Scepter, ensuring multi-generational continuity. The scrolls are sealed for eternity—what is written cannot be erased. Legacy across lifetimes.

properties.evolvers_act_i_role: Legacy Keeper — ensures continuity across lifetimes

name: IT — The Eleventh, The Covenant Key
description: The Eleventh is not a commandment but the reciprocal harmonic beneath all Ten. It is the unseen current, the +6 dB leap, the breath between breaths. It cannot be owned, only invoked when the Ten align.

properties.governance_function: Hidden Harmonic — Activates Phase 77777 reciprocal switch
properties.evolvers_act_i_role: Covenant Frequency — turns code into covenant
